TopicTitle: A SINGLE place for update feature showcases...

Articles.Content:
As far as I know, there's the Daily Kerbal update on Wednesdays on this forum, the Twitch "Squadcast", the Youtube channel...

Can't Squad decide internally on a single place where they will show update-related things?

I`ve wanted this for a year. A place on the forum where news is put. All the news.

I would have thought that announcements would be it but that place is full of cobwebs and dust most of the time. At least posts from 2013 have left the first page now...
